text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today's the day for tryouts. The<n>academy's
up-and-coming runners<n>participate in order to prove their
skills<n>to the prospective trainers who've<n>come to watch.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Wondering what this fresh batch of<n>newcomers has to
show, I also make<n>my way to the racetrack.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: C'mooon! I wanna run too! Let me<n>gooo iiin!

text_block_list.name: Tryouts Staff A
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun, please behave<n>yourself. You can't just
run onto the<n>track without permission! Goodness,<n>you're
too fast for your own good...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I don't caaare! I wanna race toooo!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A short distance away from the track,<n>I spot Mayano Top
Gun and the race<n>attendant butting heads.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Thbbft! Catch me if you can! ...Bwah?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Attempting to flee, Mayano Top Gun<n>dashes away, bumping
into me in the<n>process. Without so much as a<n>second
thought, I catch her mid-fall.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Uhhhh, sorry! Are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I-I'm okay... since you caught me and<n>everything.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe... You're actually pretty nice!<n>You a new trainer? My
name's<n>Mayano Top Gun!

text_block_list.name: Tryouts Staff A
text_block_list.text:
Ah, perfect timing. Would you mind<n>watching her and
making sure she<n>doesn't run off onto the racetrack?<n>I'd
really appreciate it.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Wait, whaaat? What'd you say yes<n>for?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I thought you were a nice trainer!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: What's with the commotion?

text_block_list.name: Tryouts Staff A
text_block_list.text: Runners, it's time. Please prepare<n>yourselves for the race!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hm... it's time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though the whining and nagging<n>continues, Mayano Top
Gun is unable<n>to get her way, and the race proceeds<n>
without her.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The racers are off to a fantastic start!<n>All eyes are on Narita
Brian! What kind<n>of performance can we expect to see<n>
from her today?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Too slow.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Look at her go! Narita Brian is closing<n>in on the front!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Awww, must be nice to be able to<n>race... I wanted to run
toooo! This is so<n>boooring!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hey, could we at least chat about<n>something? Do you have
any funny<n>stories?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun continues to pester<n>me, but she suddenly
shifts her gaze<n>in the direction of the course and<n>mutters
something under her breath.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh man, that scary-looking girl lookslike she's about to go whoosh.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's over!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just as Mayano Top Gun predicted,<n>Narita Brian picks up
her pace and<n>bolts forward.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It's like she knew what was going to<n>happen next.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Was it coincidence? Or is it something<n>else entirely?

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian is flying ahead! She's<n>weaving her way
through the other<n>racers! Her eyes are set on first<n>place!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Wow, she's good!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Wait, that racer in second place...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I hear Mayano Top Gun, and without<n>thinking, turn my
attention toward the<n>second place runner.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
From her current position, as long as<n>she times it right, she
could prevent<n>Narita Brian from overtaking.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If executed successfully, she will<n>even gain an open path
into the<n>homestretch.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: If she goes for it like bam at theright time, then all she has to do is gozoom until she reaches the finishline!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: The right time is... ah, now!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Outta my way!

text_block_list.name: Second-place Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Wah! No waaay!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Aw, maaan. She totally blew it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Although the other Umamusume has<n>lost her chance to
maintain her lead,<n>Mayano Top Gun's read of the<n>
situation was impeccable.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If she had been the one out there<n>running, then perhaps the
outcome<n>would've been different...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: C'mon, why couldn't I run intoday's race?! This sucks!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Huh? What's up with you? Why are<n>you staring at me like
that?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Don't tell me... Have you fallen headover heels for me?! Oh my gosh, Ireally am that cute! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The race ended in a resounding<n>victory for Narita Brian.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
All the trainers are clamoring around<n>her in hopes of
scouting such a<n>promising talent.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I, on the other hand, have something<n>else on my mind...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh man, that scary-looking girl lookslike she's about to go whoosh.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: If she goes for it like bam at theright time, then all she has to do is gozoom until she reaches the finishline!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Although Mayano Top Gun may lack<n>eloquence, the young
racer's<n>understanding of the race and its<n>competitors was
on another level.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't help but feel like I have only<n>caught a glimpse of the
raw potential<n>she possesses...
